snippet.title: Lair of Anubis - Official Game Trailer (Final)
snippet.description:
ADD TO WISHLIST HERE: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2121000/Lair_of_Anubis/

Game is releasing 30.11.2023!

Lair of Anubis is a short first-person horror adventure game. You became an archaeologist to uncover the truths of ancient civilisations. But your greatest desire has always been to discover a pyramid for yourself and have your name written in the history books. Just yesterday, a strange old man with unusual hieroglyphs tattooed on his face, the type you have never seen before, told you of a pyramid hidden deep in the sand, accessible only once every few centuries. You didn't put much stock in the story, but decided to investigate it anyway.

Check also my first game here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1897380/Zemblanity/
